name: Turbo Smoke Lite
description:
The worlds most powerful motorsport now comes to your portable device! Build your tractor and compete with others online to claim the bragging rights.

Upgrade your tractor and move through several classes and tracks to be a champion.

Bore out your engine add a stroker crank, upgrade your turbo, intake, or chassis to compete at a higher level.

Tune your tire pressure, adjust your weight and find the perfect setup for each track.

This game is made by pullers for pulling fans and pullers. Our programmers and development team consists of real tractor pullers to get the details as close to real as possible.
